text: Ndu mba khesharigi tɨvi, ndu nta khothɨgi ndɨkndɨk, ana ram mbui khesharigi, ana ndu bigɨn ma. Fhe Bakɨme, ana ndun ndɨkndɨga kaŋgi, ana ŋko bigɨn ma. Guma, ana Fhe Bakɨme nɨman bigɨn thueŋ muuŋv, ana wo ndava vhen kaŋgi, Fhe Bakɨme mba bigeŋ ga suaŋv ana suaŋgirga tuktɨgi fhu, ana ndikndigɨri.
